name: Hot Cocoa Magic!
description:
"Hot Cocoa Magic!" is a kinetic visual novel about a socially anxious witch and the power of hot cocoa!

All assets are made with watercolors! 

The sprites, backgrounds, transitions and textbox (as well as the thumbnail for this page!) are all made with traditional media! 

Features:

✿ ~1k words / 10 minutes of gameplay

✿ Watercolor artwork!

✿ Original music

✿ 1920 x 1080 resolution

My project for Winter VN Jam 2022!

This VN was completed in 2 months (at quite a casual pace) between November 3rd 2022 and January 1st 2023!

This is my first attempt at both watercolor artwork and making music for a Visual Novel, it was a fun experience!

I hope you enjoy it!
